EmailTemplate.description: Use when an adjustment has been made to a case note entry.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Note Entry Adjustment
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Note Entry Adjustment - {!Case.Employee__c}, # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
The following Case Note Entry(ies) from report dated [ADMIN INSERT SERVICE DATE THRU] was adjusted and/or removed for the following reason(s):
[ADMIN:
LIST ADJUSTED AND/OR REMOVED CASE NOTE ENTRY(IES); PROVIDE DATE OF ENTRY, CODE, DESCRIPTION, ORIGINAL INCREMENT AMOUNT WITH ADJUSTED AMOUNT,THE REASON FOR THE CHANGE AND THE TOTAL AMOUNT ADJUSTED.]
Retain this email for reference.
Please contact your Supervisor if you have any questions or need further clarification.
Thank you,
[INSERT NAME OF ADMIN]
